document_data.caption: A map showing Caravan Street and surroundings, with Redbridle Stables labeled as #215.
document_data.name: The Redbridle Stables
document_data.mainbody: '''The Redbridle Stables''' were a stables in the city of [[Waterdeep]] that was owned by [[Rhazbos Redbridle]].
document_data.Location: These stables were located along [[Caravan Street]] and [[Wall Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] of Waterdeep.
document_data.Structure: The Redbridle Stables was a two-story-tall building.
document_data.Services: [[Mount]]s and gear related to them, such as [[bit and bridle|bits, bridles]], and [[saddle]]s, could be purchased here.
document_data.Reputation: The Redbridle Stables were considered to be a fairly successful business.
